```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(dplyr)
```

## Data 

```{r}
x <- c(1, 3, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 11, 13, 14, 15, 17, 18, 19, 22)
x

y <- c(6, 12, 16, 18, 19, 24, 29, 34, 40, 45, 48, 53, 59, 67, 71)
y
```

## Create a scatterplot

```{r}
qplot(x = x, y = y, geom = "point")

```
## Produce the lm model and summary

```{r}
bon <- lm(y ~ x)
bon

summary(bon)
```
slope (B1) = 3.035  
y intercept (B0) = 3.692 

standard error of BO = 1.21544
standard error of B1 =  0.09727

## Find the bonferroni 90% confidence intervals for B0 and B1

Interval for B1 = 3.035 +/- 2.16037(0.09727) = 2.82  <=  B1 <= 3.24
Interval for B0 = 3.692 +/- 2.16037(1.21544) = 1.06  <=  BO <= 6.32
